Name: Vulnerability Up
Effect: For 2 rounds, all damage is tripled.

Name: Consolation
Effect: For 4 rounds, all damage spaces have no effect.

Name: Earthly Star
Effect: For 2 rounds, landing on a healing space heals 5 additional points and deals 5 damage to anyone else within 5 spaces of it. If no players have landed on a healing space during the duration, the effect is extended by 2 more rounds but healing 10 additional points and dealing 10 damage to anyone else within 5 spaces.

Name: The Burn
Effect: For 2 rounds, summon spaces have no effect.

Name: Heavy Aether
Effect: For 2 rounds, all damage spaces also make you roll on the summon table.

Name: Mantra Field
Effect: For 2 rounds, all healing from healing spaces is doubled.

Name: Healing Wind
Effect: For 3 rounds, everyone gains 5 points at the beginning of their turn unless they’re incapacitated.

Name: Pulse of Life
Effect: Everyone gains 10 points and is cured of being incapacitated at the end of this round.

Name: Landwaker
Effect: For 2 rounds, no one can take damage.

Name: Hidden Canals
Effect: For 2 round, anyone who passes through a diversion space rolls on the treasure table unless they have two treasures already.

Name: Rogues’ Guild
Effect: Everyone loses their treasures at the end of this round.

Name: Exdeath’s White Hole
Effect: For 2 rounds, anyone who takes damage becomes petrified and loses their next turn.

Name: Neo Exdeath’s Beyond Death
Effect: For 3 rounds, anyone who becomes unconscious is cured immediately and gains 40 points.

Name: Halicarnassus's The Game
Effect: For 3 rounds, all damage spaces turn you into a frog and make you roll again immediately.

Name: Aspected Helios
Effect: For 4 rounds, everyone gains 3 points at the end of their turn.

Name: Thrown for a Loop
Effect: For 4 rounds, anyone who rolls under 5 loses their turn.

Name: Gales
Effect: For 5 rounds, everyone moves 1 extra space.

Name: Umbral Static
Effect: For 5 rounds, passing by another player deals 1 damage to both players.

Name: Umbral Wind
Effect: For 5 rounds, passing by another player makes you advance 1 extra space.

Name: Gloom
Effect: All the summon spaces become diversion spaces for 3 rounds.

Name: Radiant Plume
Effect: For 3 rounds, all healing spaces become damage spaces.

Name: Friction
Effect: For 4 rounds, all healing spaces do not heal.

Name: Leniency
Effect: For 4 rounds, passing by an incapacitated player revives them with 5 points.

Name: Leniency
Effect: For 4 rounds, passing by a player that has 10 or less points, instantly reduces them to 0 points.

Name: Horoscope
Effect: For 5 rounds, all healing effects heal for an additional 5 points.

Name: Auroras
Effect: For 4 rounds, all movement speed is reduced by 2. If your movement speed would become 0 because of this effect, you lose a turn.

Name: Darkness
Effect: For 4 rounds, healing and damaging spaces have no effect.

Name: Eruptions
Effect: For 4 rounds, damaging spaces deal 1 extra damage and then make you move back one space.

Name: Heat Wave
Effect: For 4 rounds, if you roll more than 5 in your movement roll, you take 2 damage.

Name: Louring
Effect: For 3 rounds, summon spaces become healing spaces.

Name: Oppression
Effect: For 4 rounds, players cannot be within 1 space of each other and doing so triggers a duel. Losing a duel knocks you back 2 spaces.

Name: Quick Levin
Effect: For 4 rounds, passing another player while moving for your turn makes you move 5 additional spaces.

Name: Rough Seas
Effect: For 4 rounds, if your score is an even number, you move forward for your movement roll. Otherwise, you move backward.

Name: Royal Levin
Effect: For 5 rounds, everyone gains +3 to damage rolls.

Name: Shelf Clouds
Effect: For 4 rounds, players cannot duel each other. If a player lands on another player’s space, they move forward a space instead.

Name: Smoke
Effect: For 4 rounds, players cannot target each other with effects that would do damage. Players can still duel.

Name: Storm Clouds
Effect: For 4 rounds, if you end your turn within 5 spaces of another player, you take 1 damage.

Name: Tension
Effect: For 5 rounds, duel damage is doubled.

Name: Dimensional Disruption
Effect: For 4 rounds, landing in a space within 3 spaces of a summon space activates it instead of the normal effect.
